room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The room had a great theme and we were very excited going into the experience. There was a very mixed reaction in our group for this escape room - some of our group really had fun, and others really didn't. I think what was hardest is that while there was clearly plenty to keep us engaged the full hour, there wasn't much to keep all 10 people in the room engaged that whole time, which resulted in several times where I stood there watching someone else do something or someone else stared at me. So, it has potential but a might benefit from a more experienced/friendlier/professional room operator and fewer people in the room at once.

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This is the first escape room I've ever been to, and it has definitely set the bar high for any others I go to in the future! The staff was very friendly (even offering additional hints from the prerecorded ones when my group got frustrated) and it was a great experience! My group (5 people in the bank heist room) finished with just under 10 minutes left, and we all left feeling very satisfied with the amount we were challenged! Hints were really helpful without giving away everything immediately, and everything worked/opened as it was supposed to! I will definitely be back to Escape the Room with my friends again!

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had a great time tonight in The Western Bank Heist! Seriously - the setup & detail of the scene was amazing. The clues were great and it was fun working as a team to get out. We will be back for another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: It was great! My group plus the 2 people we didn't know worked together and we got out with 5 mins to spare. The staff was fun and very upbeat. I would definitely visit again.

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Great fun for a group of friends, family or coworkers! This was our first escape room, so we didn't know what to expect but the experience far exceeded our expectations! Our clue master was lots of fun and seemed to enjoy working as much as we enjoyed the escape room.
